name: CGColorConversionInfoTransformType
desc: Constants describing how a color conversion uses color spaces.

items.name: case transformApplySpace
items.desc: Specifies a color conversion between one color profile and another.

items.name: case transformFromSpace
items.desc: Specifies a color conversion from a device color space to a color profile.

items.name: case transformToSpace
items.desc: Specifies a color conversion from a color profile to a device color space.
